pages.text: Suspicious blocks are fragile gravity-affected blocks found in various Overworld $(l:world/structures)$(thing)Structures$(). $(br2)They can be brushed to extract structure-dependent loot, and are the only source of $(item)Pottery Sherds$(). $(br2)Suspicious blocks drop nothing if they are broken.

$(item)Suspicious Sand$() generates naturally in buried rooms under $(l:world/structures#pyramid)$(thing)Desert Pyramids$(), in the bottom of $(l:world/structures#well)$(thing)Desert Wells$() & $(l:world/structures#ruin)$(thing)Warm Ocean Ruins$(). $(br2)$(item)Suspicious Gravel$() generates naturally in $(l:world/structures#ruin)$(thing)Cold Ocean Ruins$() & $(l:world/structures#trail_ruin)$(thing)Trail Ruins$().
